# Codacy eklentisi ile ilgili sorun √ß√∂z√ºm√º (2025-08-11 17:00Z)

_**User**_

codacy eklentisine g√∂re hatalarƒ± d√ºzelt

---

_**Assistant**_

Codacy CLI, Windows √ºzerinde doƒürudan desteklenmiyor; WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) gerektiriyor. 

Sorunu √ß√∂zmek i√ßin:
- WSL kuruluysa, analizleri WSL √ºzerinden √ßalƒ±≈ütƒ±rabilirsiniz.
- WSL yoksa, Codacy MCP ayarlarƒ±nƒ± kontrol edin veya VSCode'da Copilot > MCP ayarlarƒ±nƒ± g√∂zden ge√ßirin: https://github.com/settings/copilot/features
- Sorun devam ederse, Codacy destek ekibiyle ileti≈üime ge√ßebilirsiniz.

Ba≈üka bir konuda yardƒ±mcƒ± olmamƒ± ister misiniz?

13
Hƒ∞GH

Error prone
Time to fix: 10 minutes
Why this is a problem

Detecting errors early in Python code helps prevent runtime exceptions and improves code quality. Pyflakes provides a fast and safe way to find such errors without executing the code, avoiding side effects.
How to fix it

Review and fix the reported errors in the Python source code as identified by Pyflakes to ensure correctness and reliability.

Rate the documentation for this pattern
Related code pattern: Detect Python Source Code Errors with Pyflakes
